article.para: You can get more help with Ubuntu from several Web sites and mailing lists.

listitem.para: The Ubuntu Documentation Website - this contains this guide, and other guides produced by the Ubuntu Documentation Team for Ubuntu and Kubuntu.
The Ubuntu Wiki - this contains many guides contributed by the community.
Web Forums - here you can ask questions on a forum and receive answers from the forum community.
Mailing Lists - here you can ask questions by email, and receive answers from the mailing list community.
IRC chat: &ubuntu-irc; - chat in realtime with the irc community. You will need an IRC client to connect, such as Gaim: &gaim;.

article.para: For more information, visit the How to Get Help wiki page.
